content.raw:
This is lower priority than the issues above. 

We should prevent users from adding more than one task with the same name. We can add a number at the end if an existing name is used again, or we can return an error with a message under the name field (in red) that says "This task name is already in use. Please pick another".

I think this will help avoid confusion about which task is which.
